interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Eagle) Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: zelaxy Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'} Review Text: zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders

I find these extenders are necessary when wearing medical masks because the ear loops are often too long for me. I had to use the slots closest to the middle to ensure masks fit snugly and don't fall down. I could just tie another loop to make the loops shorter but I prefer using these extenders because they hold the loops better. My ears are small. Loops tend to just get pulled out from behind my ears. Review Title: Good hold on mask ear loops Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} Nice green color with a refreshing cucumber scent. This feels light, not greasy and yet is very effective at moisturizing skin. It's quickly absorbed by my skin. I like that it doesn't have any AHA or retinol so that I can use this day or night in combination with different serums. light but very effective Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} I like that the particles are much finer than those in other facial scrubs. Other facial scrubs I've tried have coarser particles, so coarse it feels like I'm rubbing sand on my face.

What I don't like is that the product I received will expire in less than 3 months - Oct 2020. This doesn't seem to be just a one-time occurrence. I also purchased the "Higher Education MBA Night Renewing Serum with 0.5% retinol". That one expires even sooner - on Sep 2020.

I don't know what Amazon's policy is on expiration dates for skin care products. But, if I were purchasing this from a physical store, I wouldn't get something that expires in less than 3 months. I expect a product to be good for at least a year. Granted, expired doesn't automatically mean that a product is unusable. However, customers don't like getting old stock especially when a customer still has to pay full price for it. I didn't it but, if I were, I'd be annoyed enough to return the item.

I also don't know if Higher Education regularly sends soon-to-expire items to Amazon or if they're just doing this to Vine purchases. Either way, that's really not good practice. For a facial scrub that costs $25, I don't expect the seller to pass off expiring products on me.
UPDATE - After going through reviews of the two Higher Education products, it appears that they regularly send soon-to-expire products to customers. Bad seller - Higher Education. Really really bad.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should return the product. expires in less than 3 months MBA Renewing Retinol Serum, 1.7 fl. oz, 0.5% Retinol Hydrates & Brightens Skin's Appearance by Diminishing the Look of Breakouts, Hyperpigmentation, and Signs of Aging by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.4 x 1.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381034009'} Received July 23, 2020.

I use this 2x a week in the evenings after applying hyaluronic serum. I've experienced no allergic reaction. I chose this because the retinol concentration (0.5%) isn't too high.

This is the second Higher Education skin care product I've purchased that has a very short expiration period - expires in less than 2 months (Sep 2020). The first was the "Grinding Away skin polishing scrub" that expires in less than 3 months (Oct 2020).

I'm really annoyed that Higher Education is stocking Amazon with old products. If I were paying full price for this, I would expect to receive "fresh" products - with at least a year before expiration. If I were purchasing this from a physical store, I'd give this back to the counter lady and just look for something else.

One star for sending me an old product. Amazon, stop selling old products! Customers who paid full price for this - you should be returning the product. expires in less than 2 months Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, Exfoliating Long Silicone Body Back Brush, Handle Scrubbing Pad, Easy to Clean, Lathers Well, Comfortable Massage for Shower(Green) Lnlofen {'Package Dimensions': '9.37 x 7.44 x 1.93 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803786'} Lnlofen Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower

First of all, it's not 30". It's 29" long. One inch isn't much. Whether 29 or 30", it's still too short for a tall guy with long arms. It also doesn't scrub that well. I have a 130-cm (51 inches) nylon exfoliating scrub from Daiso. That one really makes great contact with my back and can also be folded up tight to scrub the rest of my body (arms, neck, etc.). Folding up this Lnlofen scrubber ends up making it to thick and awkward to scrub my neck, arms, etc. Too short, doesn't effectively scrub back, awkward to scrub other parts of body zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Eagle) zelaxy {'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'} zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders

I find these extenders are necessary when wearing medical masks because the ear loops are often too long for me. I had to use the slots closest to the middle to ensure masks fit snugly and don't fall down. I could just tie another loop to make the loops shorter but I prefer using these extenders because they hold the loops better. My ears are small. Loops tend to just get pulled out from behind my ears. Good hold on mask ear loops
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** Prefers products for dry and sensitive skin, continuing to experiment with gentle exfoliators and low-concentration retinol.
- **Texture Preference:** Enjoys lightweight, non-greasy formulas that absorb quickly, maintaining this preference despite recent trials.
- **Scent Preference:** Favors refreshing, natural scents, particularly cucumber, but remains open to other fragrances.
- **Ingredient Sensitivity:** Chooses gentle, versatile options, typically avoiding stronger active ingredients like AHA or retinol, yet willing to try low-concentration retinol without adverse reactions.
- **Product Effectiveness:** Values efficacy in moisturizing and skin improvement without irritation, expressing frustration with outdated products and short expiration dates from a specific brand, reinforcing a demand for fresh stock.
- **Brand Affinity:** Generally positive towards brands but dissatisfied with one brand’s inventory practices; recent interactions highlighted a focus on product quality and effectiveness.
- **Personal Care Tools:** Recently purchased a back scrubber but was disappointed by its length and scrubbing efficacy. Additionally, the user has shown a preference for effective personal care solutions, as evidenced by their purchase of mask strap extenders for enhanced comfort during mask-wearing, demonstrating a focus on practicality and usability in personal care items.

The user continues to seek effective, gentle solutions that enhance moisture and texture while being vigilant about product quality and usability, avoiding brands that do not align with their expectations.
